gov.nih.nlm.mrd.server
Class ServerToolkit

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.swing.SwingToolkit
      gov.nih.nlm.meme.MEMEToolkit
          gov.nih.nlm.meme.server.ServerToolkit
              gov.nih.nlm.mrd.server.ServerToolkit
All Implemented Interfaces:
MEMEConstants, SwingConstants
public class ServerToolkit
extends ServerToolkit

Utility class for the MRD Application Server. It contains methods for initializing applications, managing the data source pool, and other useful things.

Author:
MEME Group

Method Detail

setDataSourcePool

public static void setDataSourcePool(MRDDataSourcePool dp)
Sets data source pool.

Parameters:
dp - the MRDDataSourcePool

newMRDDataSource

public static MRDDataSource newMRDDataSource()
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException
Returns a newly instantiated default MRDDataSource.

Returns:
a newly instantiated default MRDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file

newMRDDataSource

public static MRDDataSource newMRDDataSource(String service,
                                             String user,
                                             String password)
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException
Returns a newly instantiated MRDDataSource. If service is "", use MRD_SERVICE property. Note: this method belongs in DataSourcePool.

Parameters:
service - the service name (e.g. editing-d)
user - the username
password - the password
Returns:
a newly instantiated MRDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file
See Also:
MIDServices

getMRDDataSource

public static MRDDataSource getMRDDataSource()
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException,
                                             PoolOverflowException
Returns a MRDDataSource from the data source pool.

Returns:
a MRDDataSource from the data source pool
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file
PoolOverflowException - if data source limit has been reached

returnDataSource

public static void returnDataSource(MEMEDataSource ds)
                             throws BadValueException
Returns specified MEMEDataSource to the data source pool, or closes it if it does not belong in the pool.

Parameters:
ds - the MEMEDataSource to return
Throws:
BadValueException - if failed due to invalid data value
